divs: Sighting DetailsObjec descended at less than 40 degree angle, from approximately 222degrees SW to 206degrees SW. Some years ago I saw a Space Shuttle fly over. It was faster than that, but not as fast as a meteor. This can probably be explained, but it seemed odd to me. I was outside our barn, and just happened to look up and see it. I lost sight of it behind our house. It was a great distance away. I'm curious if anyone else saw it, and what an explanation could be.
Summary: Too big, bright and slow for a meteor. Too fast and bright for a plane, and only one light.
